entity.name: The Great British Bake Off
entity.description: Ultimate baking masterclass with judges Mary Berry and Paul Hollywood.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Bake Off: The Professionals
entity.description: Hosted by Liam Charles and Stacey Solomon, 'Bake Off: The Professionals' welcomes professional pastry chefs, some of whom have experience of working for some of the United Kingdom's top hotels, restaurants and businesses, to compete in a series of baking challenges. From intricately designed miniatures, to show-stopping tarts and cakes, judges Cherish Finden and Benoit Blin make sure the teams use all of their skills to produce a variety of delicious desserts, knowing that failure to do so can result in elimination from the competition.

urls.title: Covid 19 Questions – Ryanair Help Centre
urls.description: Do I need to wear a mask on board? Some countries still require passengers to wear a face covering/mask on board when flying in and out of the country. We recommend that, before you fly, you check the latest Covid-19 restrictions and requirements of your destination/arrival countries here. What Covid-19 documents are required for travel? Covid-19 document requirements vary by destination. It is each passengers’ responsibility to be aware of all mandatory travel requirements before they fly, as failure to

data.text:
@PhMonnoyer Hi, we can only inform customers if a flight is operational or not. We can´t provide information regarding needed tests/documents as they are beyond our control. The links below might be quite helpful:  
- https://t.co/UyzQuuH22s  
- https://t.co/ZOYK6nXXYr  
Ana

urls.description: Do I need to wear a mask on board? Some countries still require passengers to wear a face covering/mask on board when flying in and out of the country. We recommend that, before you fly, you check the latest Covid-19 restrictions and requirements of your destination/arrival countries here. What Covid-19 documents are required for travel? urls.title: Covid 19 Questions – Ryanair Help Centre
urls.description: Do I need to wear a mask on board? Some countries still require passengers to wear a face covering/mask on board when flying in and out of the country. We recommend that, before you fly, you check the latest Covid-19 restrictions and requirements of your destination/arrival countries here. What Covid-19 documents are required for travel? Covid-19 document requirements vary by destination. It is each passengers’ responsibility to be aware of all mandatory travel requirements before they fly, as failure to
